thread.title: Halo 5: Guardians Soundtrack Now Available Online
thread.title_full: Halo 5: Guardians Soundtrack Now Available Online

author: Alex Osborn
title: Halo 5: Guardians Soundtrack Now Available Online
text:
Got feedback on our player? We want to hear it. 
Halo 5: Guardians releases next week on October 27. If you don't mind a few minor spoilers, here's an early look at the game's full list of achievements . 
Will you be picking up a copy on launch day? If so, do you plan to jump right into the game's campaign, or will you be taking the fight online in Warzone or Arena first? Let us know in the comments. 
Alex Osborn is a freelance writer for IGN. You can follow him on Twitter . IN THIS ARTICLE
